title: [Good] Tinder provides safety tips for using their service.

tosdr.case: [Good] Tinder provides safety tips for using their service.-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr:
Tinder provides safety tips for using their service, such as keep your financial and personal information private, and the following guidelines for meeting in person:
Get to know the other person before meeting them offline
Always meet in public
Tell a friend Inform a friend or family member of your plans
Drive yourself to and from the first meeting
